Packages
```{r}
library(data.table)
```

Data
```{r}
dt = fread("../data/industry_incomes.csv")
```

Data cleaning
```{r}
# Subset to variables of interest
industry = dt[, .(
  `Broad Industry1`,
  `Number of individuals`,
  `Taxable income or loss3
  no.`,
  `Taxable income or loss3$`
  )]
# Rename columns
  setnames(industry,
  c(
  "Broad Industry1",
  "Taxable income or loss3
  no.",
  "Taxable income or loss3
  $"
  ),
  c("Indutry",
    "")
```
